info.description: This is a server build with NodeJS, Express and PostgreSQL, the goal is to setup an API to manipulate Invoices
info.title: Stone Challenge

get.description: Search all active invoices stored in database following the filters paramaters

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the itended page. The page counting starts at 0

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of items in one page, needs to be grather 0

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filters available: referenceMonth, referenceYear, document. The filter must be expressed as: field:value. If needs more than one condition then must be passed separated by comma ',' (field:value,field:value)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by: referenceMonth, referenceYear, document. To sort the list you need pass the fields separated by comma ',' the default orientation is ASC. To specify the orientation (DESC or ASC) pass filed:(ASC|DESC),filed:(ASC|DESC)

200.description: Returns an object with property data that is an array of invoices.

400.description: Problems with passed query params, page and itemsPerPage required

500.description: Internal server error, usually database query execution problems

post.description: This action will create a new invoice seting as active and with created at equals now

parameters.name: document
parameters.description: The invoice document name, must be less then or equal 14 caracters

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The invoice description, must be less then or equal 256 caracters
parameters.example: A description that explain the invoice

parameters.name: referenceMonth
parameters.description: The invoice month reference, must be a number in the range 1 (january), 12 (december)

parameters.name: referenceYear
parameters.description: The invoice year reference, must be a number in the range 1900 2100

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of items inside an invoice, must be a number
